text: Belmont-Broye is a new municipality of the district of Broye in the canton of Fribourg in Switzerland. It was created on 1 January 2016 when the former municipalities of Domdidier, Dompierre, Léchelles and Russy merged to form Belmont-Broye.Nomenklaturen – Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz accessed 3 February 2016 == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:2016 establishments in Switzerland Category:Municipalities in Broye
title: Belmont-Broye
